General.Name: Shanghai Aohua Photoelectricity Endoscope Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Shanghai AoHua Photoelectricity Endoscope Co., Ltd., a medical device company, engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of electronic endoscopic equipment and other consumables in China and internationally. It also offers electronic digestive endoscopes, otolaryngoscopes, bronchoscopes, endoscopic diagnostic and treatment consumables, endoscopic accessories, etc. for use in gastroenterology, respiratory, ENT, gynecology, emergency, and other clinical departments. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Shanghai, China.

2.Name: Mr. Xiaojiang  Shi
2.Title: Deputy Gen. Mang. & Sec. of the Board of Directors
